description: Three letters could dominate market psychology in the next few days: F-E-D. New Orleans unveils a new levee. And Washington state builds a marijuana market from scratch.

title: PODCAST: F, E, D, spells what?
contentencoded:
As much as marijuana initiatives are an experiment in drug legalization, they are also a business experiment. How do you set up an entirely new commercial marketplace worth billions?

In Louisiana today, the Army Corps of Engineers is holding a ribbon cutting to announce the completion of the levee system that covers the West Bank of the Mississippi. It's just one part of the $14.5 billion overhaul of the region's flood protection system.

And three letters could dominate market psychology in the next few days: F-E-D.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Monday, June 17, 2013
